comments.body: Because of the force-push I couldn't tell whether my previous suggestion changed anything in the tests (to be fair, it might be difficult to get into that state since the only place that creates `CommaListExpression` flattens existing commas). The only way I could see that happening is with a custom "before" transform", so its good to keep this in even if we may never actually hit this case.
I assume if this doesn't break our build, it's fine to remove these assertions.
On the previous line, the comment that says "we are not handling YieldStar at this time" is now out of date. #Closed
